path.description: The source path where the class files should be evaluated, relative to the workspace root. If not specified, the 'src' directory will be assumed.
path.x-prompt: What is the path to the source files?

target.description: The target path where the test files should be created, relative to the workspace root. If not specified, the 'src' directory will be assumed.
target.x-prompt: What is the target path for the unit test files?

overwrite.description: When true, overwrites files with the same name.
overwrite.x-prompt: Would you like to overwrite unit test files?

dryRun.description: When true, no files will be created or modified.
dryRun.x-prompt: Would you like to run the schematic without creating or modifying unit test files?
